DRSLTR 1 filename1.htm &nbsp; New York Northern California Washington DC S&atilde;o Paulo London Paris Madrid Tokyo Beijing Hong Kong &nbsp; &nbsp; Davis Polk &amp; Wardwell LLP&nbsp; 450 Lexington Avenue New York, NY 10017&nbsp; 212 450 4000 tel&nbsp; 212 701 5800 fax&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; August 2, 2021 &nbsp; Re: Nu Holdings Ltd. Confidential Submission of the Draft Registration Statement on Form F-1&nbsp; Submitted August 2, 2021&nbsp; &nbsp; U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission&nbsp; Division of Corporation Finance 100 F Street, N.E. Washington, D.C. 20549 &nbsp; Ladies and Gentlemen: &nbsp; On behalf of our client, Nu Holdings Ltd. (the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;), an exempted company with limited liability incorporated under the laws of the Cayman Islands, we have confidentially submitted a draft registration statement on Form F-1 (the &ldquo;Draft Registration Statement&rdquo;) relating to a proposed initial public offering (&ldquo;IPO&rdquo;) of the Company&rsquo;s Class A ordinary shares via EDGAR to the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &ldquo;Commission&rdquo;) for confidential review pursuant to the Jumpstart Our Business Startups Act (the &ldquo;JOBS Act&rdquo;). &nbsp; For the staff&rsquo;s convenience, we have also enclosed three copies of the Draft Registration Statement, as confidentially submitted on EDGAR. The Company confirms that it is an &ldquo;emerging growth company&rdquo;, as defined in the JOBS Act and its securities have not been previously sold pursuant to an effective registration statement under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended. &nbsp; A formal filing of the Registration Statement will be made at a later date, which in no event will be later than 15 days before the Company commences its road show. &nbsp; The review partner for this submission at the current audit firm, KPMG Auditores Independentes, is Rodrigo Bassi, who can be reached at +55 (11) 97133-3666. Please do not hesitate to contact Byron Rooney at 212-450-4658 or byron.rooney@davispolk.com or Manuel Garciadiaz at 212-450-6095 or manuel.garciadiaz@davispolk.com if you have any questions regarding the foregoing or if I can provide any additional information. &nbsp; Very truly yours, &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; /s/ Byron B. Rooney /s/ Manuel Garciadiaz &nbsp; &nbsp; cc: David V&eacute;lez Osorno, Chief Executive Officer, Nu Holdings Ltd. Guilherme Marques do Lago, Chief Financial Officer, Nu Holdings Ltd.&nbsp; Marco Araujo, General Counsel, Nu Holdings Ltd.&nbsp; Rodrigo Bassi, KPMG Auditores Independentes &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;
